## readme

This is the repository for the Reproducible Research using R workshop at the 2025 meeting of the American Society of Mammalogists, held at Purdue University from June 27 - July 1, 2025.

The workshop and its materials have been organized and presented by Marissa Dyck and Erika Barthelmess.

We hope you find these materials helpful in your quest toward a reproducible research workflow!
